document_data.mainbody:
House of Joy was the shrine built to Lliira in the small town of Asbravn. Both the town and shrine were situated within an isolated area of the Sunset Vale, where the Dusk Road met the Uldoon Trail.
It was one of several smaller shrines, including those to Lathander and Waukeen, built around the rundown yet still-running House of the Suffering God, dedicated to Ilmater.
